title: nallOraik-kAppavanE
sahitya:
nallOraik-kAppavanE unnai nADip-padamalargaL vADAmal arccittEn


anupallavi

  pollOr porAmai ennaik-kallAl aDittiDinum poruttukkoNDE unakkup-pUmAlai toDuttanan


caraNam    pugazhndAlum ulagennai igazhndAlum poruTTillai pUjai malaraik-koNDu vEsaikku muDippanO
magizhndu nI en maNamAlaiyai EtrAlE vAzhvu sirandadenru mangaLam pADiDuvEn
